entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You have successfully rescued the third Alliance Pilot from the Imperial Detainment Facility.
entries.journal_entry_description: Search the Imperial Detainment Facility for the next Alliance Pilot being held there
entries.task01_task_display_string_2: You defeated Group Leader EX-222 and took his Stormtrooper Armor.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Search the main detention room located at the center of the Detention Facility. The pilot should be in one of the closer containment bays.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Give the pilot the disguise you have.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Defeat EX-222 in combat and take his Stormtrooper Group Leader Armor.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Defeat some Droideka Sentries defending the administrative office and hallways.
